thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
An Uncertain Road
President Trump is expected to unveil a program to transform how the nationâ€™s infrastructure is funded and developed. Mr. Trump will propose spending $200 billion over 10 years, mostly in the form of new, competitive grants designed to encourage states and cities to raise their own money for improving rails, airports, highways and water systems. It is unclear where the federal dollars will come from, especially as the new two-year budget agreement could boost deficits to $1 trillion by next year,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
